sourcesContent:
import {Form,Button,Container, Row, Col, Alert, ListGroup ,Card} from 'react-bootstrap'
import {Helmet} from 'react-helmet'
import React from 'react'
import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux';
import {Redirect} from 'react-router-dom'

export default function CreatePost() {
    const {user}=useSelector(state=>state);

    return (
        <>
        {user ? null :<Redirect to="/" /> }
            <Helmet>
                <meta charSet="utf-8" />
                <title>Create Post</title>
            </Helmet>
            <Container fluid>
            <Row>
            <Col xs={6} className="mx-auto">
            <Card style={{ marginTop:'30px',backgroundColor:'' }}>
 
  <Card.Body>
    <Card.Title>Create New Post</Card.Title>
    <Form>
    <Form.Group as={Row} controlId="formPlaintext">
    <Form.Label column sm="2">
      Title
    </Form.Label>
    <Col sm="10">
      <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="Enter Post Title" />
    </Col>
  </Form.Group>

  <Form.Group>
    <input
      type="file"
      className="custom-file-input"
      id="inputGroupFile01"
      aria-describedby="inputGroupFileAddon01" 
    />
    <label className="custom-file-label"  style={{backgroundColor: ""}}htmlFor="inputGroupFile01">
      Choose file
    </label>
 
    </Form.Group>


 
</Form>
    <Button variant="info">Create</Button>
  </Card.Body>
</Card>
</Col>
</Row>
</Container>

            
        </>
    )
}
